source: TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_SEQ_00<tab>789th Order Dustman Bo Zu is mad as hells, and you're not going to take it anymore.
target: TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_SEQ_00<tab>第789洞穴団の採掘地のダストマン789 ボ・ズは、悔しい思いをしているようだ。

source: TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_SEQ_01<tab>Bo Zu is boiling with anger at the kobolds of the 639th Order, who take perverse pride and pleasure in browbeating the 789th despite their similar position at the arse end of the kobold hierarchy. To serve them their just deserts, venture to Iron Lake and deliver a good thrashing to two of their rank and file to attract the attention of their overseer, upon whom you may then visit a similar fate.
target: TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_SEQ_01<tab>ダストマン789 ボ・ズは、自分を馬鹿にしたコボルド族たちに仕返しをしたいらしい。彼に代わって「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2017901 /var>」を2体討伐し、おびき寄せた「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20A7F01 /var>」を討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_SEQ_02<tab>The overseer has been taught the true meaning of pain, giving the 639th a valuable lesson about getting too big for one's breeches. Return to the 789th Order Dig and assure Bo Zu that the bullies have paid the price for their false pride.
target: TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2017901 /var>と<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20A7F01 /var>を討伐した。第789洞穴団の採掘地の「ダストマン789 ボ・ズ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_SEQ_03<tab>His oppressors having been given their just dues, Bo Zu breathes a sigh of relief and extols your virtues as a capable adventurer. For better or for worse, the dustman will not hesitate to seek your aid the next time he suffers at the hands of his betters...
target: TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_SEQ_03<tab>ダストマン789 ボ・ズに、仇敵を討伐したことを報告した。痛い思いをせずに成し遂げる復讐は最高だと、実に品性下劣なところを見せてくれた……。とはいえ喜んでいるのは確かなので、またの機会に協力しよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_TODO_00<tab>Subdue two kobold roundsmen, then defeat the kobold overseer that appears.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_TODO_00を2体討伐し
おびき寄せたを討伐

source: TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_TODO_01<tab>Report to 789th Order Dustman Bo Zu.
target: TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_TODO_01<tab>ダストマン789 ボ・ズに報告

source: TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_BOZU_000_000<tab>Riddle me, puzzle me, answer me this, adventurer: what is the difference between six-thirty-nine and seven-eighty-nine? Fifteen tens, and no more. No, no, not a one more.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_BOZU_000_000「第639洞穴団」のヤツら　許せないーど！
オイーラたちと同じ　採掘量ドベ争いの底辺なのーに
それでも　オイーラたちのこと　バカにするーど……。

source: TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_BOZU_000_001<tab>Yet the 639th thumb their nostrils at us like we are lesser kobolds─inferior, lower, lesser. Bo Zu will not stand for this, and neither will you. No, no, neither will you!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_BOZU_000_001暴力バカな第639洞穴団のヤツーら　とっちめてほしいーど。
「」を　やっつけれーば
兄貴分の「」が　出てくるーど。

source: TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_BOZU_000_002<tab>You must give the 639th's blustering boss a good pounding─a hammering, a battering, a pounding. You will find him around Iron Lake, though you may have to beat up a few of his men to draw his attention. Yes, yes, that is the way.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_BOZU_000_002今なら　「アイアンレイク」にいるーど。
オイーラの腕っ節じゃ　アイツーラに　かなわないーから
アンータ　代わりに頼んだーど！

source: TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_BOZU_000_003<tab>The good-for-nothing 639th thumb their noses at us like we are lesser kobolds─inferior, lower, lesser. Bo Zu will not stand for this, and neither will you. No, no, neither will you!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_BOZU_000_003第639洞穴団の「」と
「」　倒してほしいーど。

source: TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_BOZU_000_004<tab>You must give the 639th's blustering boss a good pounding─a hammering, a battering, a pounding. You will find him around Iron Lake, though you may have to beat up a few of his men to draw his attention. Yes, yes, that is the way.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_BOZU_000_004「」を　やっつけれーば
兄貴分の「」が　出てくるーど。

source: TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_BOZU_000_010<tab>Smashing, bashing, dashing work! Now those cretins know that fifteen tens make no matter. No, no, what matters is how strong an adventurer you know.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_BOZU_000_010やっつけてくれたーど！？
ありがとーう　ありがとーう　ムネ　スッとしたーど！

source: TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_BOZU_000_011<tab>Just watching you makes me feel strong─sturdy, stout, strong─strong enough to pummel that puffed<var 1F /var>up taskmaster myself! But I will let you do it. Yes, yes, it hurts much less that way.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_BOZU_000_011やっぱり　仕返しは　見てるだけにかぎるーど。
自分で痛い思いしなくて　最高だーど！

source: TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_POPMESSAGE_000_000<tab>A burly kobold swaggers to the scene!

TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_BALLOON_000_020You'll answer for this, overdweller.
Yes, yes, you'll pay!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB104_01328_BALLOON_000_020よくーも
やってくれーたな！
